snippet.title: Tex Murphy: Overseer Trailer (1998) - Remastered HD
snippet.description:
Trailer for the popular PC CD/DVD Rom adventure game 'Tex Murphy: Overseer'. Remastered in HD 720P from the original tape stock. Remastered audio (music from original studio recordings). -- Originally developed during a testing procedure for legacy content to appear in the upcoming game, 'Tex Murphy: Tesla Effect', and to see whether or not a future remaster of the legacy Tex Murphy games is plausible technologically and financially.

"No 1080P?" ...well, considering the original was recorded in SD using Betacam in an interlaced format, it would require much more finessing to make it look decent. The increase in quality would be negligible and wouldn't look much better than the 720P version up-scaled to 1080P anyway.
